title: "Gender Legislative Index uses machine learning to identify discriminatory laws"
excerpt: "Gender inequality can be imbedded in discriminatory laws, and until recently there has been no way to detect gender discrimination in the law. Ramona Vijeyarasa, human rights lawyer and senior lecturer at the University of Technology Sydney has developed the Gender Legislative Index (GLI) to combat this problem,"
